title: Workshop on Designing Online Higher Education Experiences for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning functions (login, downloading materials) and foundational knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Blended research-based learning experience design applying the Community of Inquiry (CoI) model in BYOD environments. Conducts project-based assessments combining social interaction and cognitive engagement

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three elements of the CoI model (teaching presence, social presence, cognitive presence) to real-world cases
Learners draft social issue-solving project proposals using peer feedback and instructor coaching in online discussion forums
Learners complete team-based final reports using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace) in blended learning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
